content.text:
# 58th Golden Bell Awards

| ratings          =
| last             = 57th
| next             = 59th
}}
The 58th Golden Bell Awards () took place on October 20, 2023 and October 21, 2023 at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremonies were televised by Sanlih E-Television. Nominees were announced on September 14, 2023.
Winners and nominees
Below is the list of winners and nominees for the television award categories. Winners are listed first and highlighted in boldface.
Special Contribution Award
{| class=wikitable
| style="vertical-align:top;" width="50%"|
* Ting Chiang
|}
